name: Magnet Murderer
description:
Manipulate Rocks Using Magnet to Crush People's life out of existence!  Submission To Game Maker's ToolKit Game Jam 2021 on Theme "Joined Together". 

In this game the rock and the magnet are joined together by "Magnetic Field" and use your creativity to manipulate the rock to kill people **cough**cough** CRUSH people.

Music by Me using BeepBox

SFX from SoundBible

Art by Me

Game made by yours truly!
